title.narrative: Partnership for Capacity Development in Sustainable Infrastructure Development and Water Resources Protection in Oromia Region, Adama and Bishoftu towns, Ethiopia

description.narrative: The proposed action will improve project management capacity of the Oromia Water, Mineral and Energy Bureau (OWMEB) for sustainable water and sanitation infrastructure development and water resources protection in the Oromia region

title.narrative: Degree of capacity of OWMEB (Oromia Water, Mineral and Energy Bureau) for water quality mapping and water resources protection

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

actual.value: Water resource and facility department well capable of monitoring water resources
